channel.title: 🏢 School of Computer Science and Engineering, Chung-Ang University on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 School of Computer Science and Engineering, Chung-Ang University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: CALANet: Cheap All-Layer Aggregation for Human Activity Recognition
item.description: CALANet: Cheap All-Layer Aggregation boosts real-time HAR accuracy by efficiently aggregating features from all layers, achieving state-of-the-art performance on seven benchmark datasets.
